Specs

CSS Class: .x-window

Ext.window.Window

Extends from Ext.panel.Panel

  • Window Header (x-window-header)

    • title

    • glyph

    • tools

  • Window Body (x-window-body)

    • icon

    • height

    • width

    • minWidth

    • maxWidth

    • x

    • y

    • +modal*

    • draggable

    • resizable
